title: Wts/wtt-  chance missing color printer's scrap!
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: Wts/wtt-  chance missing color printer's scrap!
posts.post_content:
Hello All!!!

another printer's scrap I am offering up for sacrifice......

looking to sell this AWESOME MISSING COLOR CHANCE PORTRAIT!

this is a great chance to aquire a very unique printer's scrap of CHANCE.....

card is currently raw and has slight paper loss (likely due to scrap book removal).....the removal had nothing to do with the color loss on the face of chance or the uniform....it was never printed!!!


missing color in uniform also....card is very indicative of similar scrap....


I acquired this card many years ago from another very reputable hobby legend...


card was examined by many printers scrap experts and confirmed 100 % legit printer's scrap....


card was also(BUT NOT GAURENTEED) possibly printed on the same sheet as a similar PLANK SCRAP!!!!:eek:

a board member and hobby expert Erick Summer did the comparison(Thanks Erick;))

(Plank is not mine, just used for comparison):)


willing to part with this beauty @ $1000.00  OBO

or will consider TRADES FOR GREEN COBB or COBBS....


email preferred


[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]
good luck with the sale, my friend.

thanks so much my friend! you did this comparison on Plank and Chance for me, can't thank you enough:)....Chris Browne loved this  card....100 % scrap.......

I have had a few collectors ask why I'm getting rid of a few scraps????.....

answer:

I have over 60, and bought a great scrap, just trying to trade it down!!:) I still have to finish ponying up

I will post when I'm done....


hint ....hint.....its also a EXTREMELY rare back;)
